articles.title: Depression vs. grief - Medical News Today
articles.description: Grief and depression share similar symptoms, such as sadness and emotional pain. However, depression is a clinical condition, and grief is a natural human response to loss.
articles.content: Depression is a feeling of sadness or a low persistent mood, lasting for some time. Grief is an emotional response to the loss of a loved one. Both have overlapping symptoms, but depression is a clin… [+5977 chars]

articles.title: Hyd hospital on alert as over 600 viral flu cases reported per day - Inshorts
articles.description: A rise in viral flu cases was reported in Hyderabad as the Government Fever Hospital reported around 600-800 cases per day last week. The patients are reporting symptoms like runny nose, headache, body pain, abdominal pain, vomiting and loose motions, superin…
